website_summaries.verdict: Made with an herbal extract believed to support vision, this glycerin-based compound is thought to help many eye problems, including conjunctivitis.
pros: Glycerin-based formula combines organic eyebright extract with benefits of sea salt, MSM, apple cider vinegar, and grapefruit seed extract
Helps relieve eye ailments like conjunctivitis, eye irritations, and eye strain
Relieves dry, red and weeping eyes
cons: May initially sting irritated eyes, but this goes away quickly

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these if you have cataracts and wish to possibly avoid surgery.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these if you have cataracts on your eyes. From my experience you have to use the drops daily. When I stopped the cataracts started returning. Having lost my eyesight almost entirely to the point of being totally blind, with only light perception, these removed roughly 20% of my cataracts allowing me to regain a little vision. Meaning I regained the ability to see shadows and outlines of objects as well as better light perception.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tallent

customer_reviews.title: I NEEDED a product like this so badly because I had to detached retina's
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the reviews! I NEEDED a product like this so badly because I had to detached retina's, had surgery and it left my eyes something awful!! My eyes watered 24/7 and this has been going on for over 20 years! Think of the misery. Well while on shopping on Amazon I came across this product. I ordered and have been using it for 3 days now a couple times per day and so far the change is so surprising! My eyes don't water 24/7 and the whites, which were brownish yellow, are getting clearer and clearer!!! I hope with prolong use it will get better and better! THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR YOUR HONEST REVIEWS!!!
customer_reviews.author: marian b.

customer_reviews.title: A macular degeneration wonder
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my Oriental Medicine doctor. I started using it and after 3 weeks the result of my eye test by my ophthalmologist did not require me to get any further treatment for what she thought was an early development of macular degeneration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have found the elixir to my eyes...finally after 12 years!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed my eyes are moist throughout the day and whiter. So amazing this thing. Had problems since graduating college 12 years ago. If you want to get rid of your dry, irritated, allergy eyes, use this daily and consume 3-4K mgs of organic flaxseed oil. Trust me, your research of fixing your eye problems will conclude and you have found the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me. Tired dry computer eyes .
customer_reviews.text: Picture a desert. Picture lots of heat and sand. Then picture two eyeballs walking through the desert . Those are my eyeballs from being on the computer all day . These work. Feels good but does slightly burn for a second . Which doesn't bother me at all. But may bother some people. Refreshing. Has helped my vision slightly. Less double vision but can't say it's a miracle cure.
customer_reviews.author: GdownTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: At times while using this product, I seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: At times while using this product, I seem to have regained 20/20 vision at 75 years of age. It really noticeable when I do eye exercises while reading. I'm ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: reolife

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with those eyedrops
customer_reviews.text: as I live in São Paulo Brazil, I had to wait for my friend returning from her USA trip to receive my ordered items, tht's why \ am reporting this only today. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed with those eyedrops, they make me feel unconfortable, my eyes felt dry and start itching, immediately, becomming worse on the second day, there must have occured an allergic reaction...possibly because if the unusual GRAPEFRUIT SEED OIL ingredient! never seen this before in eyedrops. I asked my mother to try them out and she did not like them either, felt the same discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: ... them as wished so I ordered this because of good reviews. The day after I used it I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have red eyes for the past 7 years and the things from the drugstore just were not clearing them as wished so I ordered this because of good reviews. The day after I used it I woke up in the morning and had a large red spot on the white of my eye I freaked out that this would be forever now on my eye so I looked up and looks like it cause a blood vessel to pop in my eye causing the red dot in my white of the eye luckily over next days it went away. I never had that before and this is the first time I had such happen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YELLOW EYES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought that the price for these eyedrops would justify the quality of the product....WRONG!!! do not use it will make your eyes yellow!!! Even used it with eyebright pills for a maximum effect but after 1 week no change whatsoever! Nothing but BURNING YELLOW EYES!!!! bad product ! please do not disappoint yourself by purchasing and also do not Play Russian Roulette with your eyes!!!!

customer_reviews.title: used for 4 days - eye infection
customer_reviews.text: developed conjunctivitis after 4 days - only received a refund because of Prime membership -

customer_reviews.title: Lovit.
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a bottle. My eyes would get red when dry and tired for 20 years. I wish I'd known of this back then...Keeps the redness at bay, eyes are left feeling hydrated and white. Most all throughout the day. Lovit.

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further for Eyedrops
customer_reviews.text: My eyes have been dry and this really works. I like that the ingredients they use are natural. Helps heal floaters also. Mine are completely gone. I would differently recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! I had a bump in my eye
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I had a bump in my eye, would get irritated and was very bothersome. Ordered these eye drops and would put one drop in the morning and one before bed time. In just four days the bump was gone, I absolutely love these drops!
customer_reviews.author: MEANSTREAK

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This burned my eyes and made them look bloodshot. Took a while for them to look clear again and I kept using it for a few days to keep testing it out. Overall I didn’t notice any difference in how clear or bright or refreshed my eyes looked or felt. I think we would probably all be better off with more sleep and less looking at our computers and phones, this is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... don't even take away the redness not add hydration like most of the reviews said waste of 15 dollars ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't work I've been using for about 3 weeks they don't even take away the redness not add hydration like most of the reviews said waste of 15 dollars honestly but I'll keep trying it for another month n update
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made My Eyes Yellow!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed my eyes were slightly yellow after using this product twice a day for several weeks. They may feel better but I'm tossing this stuff in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Been using first thing in the morning. It does sting, but other drops have stung for me as well so I thought that was normal. Trying to give it a fair trial but so far after a week along with taking the eye brite pills as well I do not have any of the results I hoped for. The bottle says use once a day, and I don't know if it's ok or safe to use again later in the day so I have been using other eye drops later on as well. Feeling disappointed, after seeing so many positive reviews before I bought them. My eyes still feel dry, irritated and sensitive to light right after using the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Sudaloo

customer_reviews.title: I bought product 2 months ago
customer_reviews.text: I was holding on to give any comments about this product, as I wanted to see what it will actually do. But If you expect for redness to go away, nope that does not happen. If you expect your stains to disappear or that little yellow mass. Nope it doesn’t do that either. I am still using product; will continue until I finish product, but so far nothing has happened.
customer_reviews.author: yari

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry eyes from LASIK and all day computer work. Unfortunately, with these drops I experience stinging, burning and eyes so dried up my lids are sticky.
customer_reviews.author: DRAnd

customer_reviews.title: Still too early for a five star mark but I'm certainly very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: This product is working very well. I have had a lot of problems with my eyes over the years and was delayed using these drops as a result of a detached retina. Since starting with the drops three weeks ago the symptoms of blepharitis have dissappeared, the pingecula on both eyes appear to have reduced in size and are no longer yellow or blood shot and overall my eyes are whiter brighter and healthier. Thank you Wisdom of the Ages. Still too early for a five star mark but I'm certainly very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Alice W

customer_reviews.title: Eyebright Drops - truly, Wisdom of the Ages
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly that which is described. The bottle is easy to use, one drop in each eye, once per day and no more dry eye, excess grit etc. The Eyebright Drops - Wisdom of the Ages, 1 fl oz. is truly cost effective because there is no waste, easy to dispense and sanitary. I normally don't review health related products because they are subjective; however, I have had complete relief and wanted to share. I am north of 60, get yearly eye exams and my eyes are in good health. No goods or services were exchanged for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Neptunia

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually terrible and a absolute rip off literally should have listen to the negative reviews ....please be careful with you eyes guys this product is not good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Portia Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops
customer_reviews.text: These are the best eye drops I have ever used. My eyes were dry and felt gritty and were not as white as they used to be. Also suffer from computer related eye strain. I use only one drop per eye per day and after only a few weeks my eyes are no longer dry, that gritty feeling is gone, eyes move more easily around, the whites are brighter, eyesight seems better, etc.... Could not be happier. If suffer from dry eye rather than use rx drops, I would try these. I think they actual heal various aspects of eye issues. A fantastic find and they do not sting nearly as much as pharmacy products.
customer_reviews.author: pondlover

customer_reviews.title: ... but once eye gets used to it they are great and only need twice a day compared to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Burn a little for a second at first but once eye gets used to it they are great and only need twice a day compared to store brands which I had to use every couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Big spender!!

customer_reviews.title: Highly questionable...
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this product, I sought to read the reviews to know exactly what I was getting myself into. After reading the reviews that spoke on the solution removing the brown spots in one’s eyes, I thought this product would do the same job for me. I’ve been using this product now for almost 3 weeks and have not seen any results with the removal or minimizing of the browns of my eyes. Some reviewer even stated they saw results within days. I highly question that as I have not had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Onagoruwa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I been using this product along with the eye brightening vitamins and I seen a difference with in two days its amazing. The products are also natural. I will definitely re buy this once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: whitney denise

customer_reviews.title: For me it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pink eye, but unfortunately have blepharitis which has no cure. I bought this to help with the symptoms. It does ease some of the symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: James Kadiddlehopper

customer_reviews.title: really helps with irritation/redness/rosacea eyes
customer_reviews.text: really suffering with red, itchy and crusty rosacea eyes.. bought based on others' reviews and it really helps! using directly as eye drops and although sometimes stings a wee bit, it's only briefly. makes eyes feel so much better and clears redness up.
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I had noticed that the whites of my eyes weren’t really white anymore. I read that as you age the sclera can turn brownish, especially if you work or just relax in the sun. So I decided to try this but didn’t hope for much. It’s been a month and a half since I started using these drops twice a day and, yep, I’m surprised! The whites of my eyes are back to white! So this actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I use it before bed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I use it before bed, when compared to the other products with polypropylene glycol—(look this one up) I am happy to find a better substitute even if it has MSM. Way better than ingredient in antifreeze!
customer_reviews.author: JP BASS

customer_reviews.title: Eyes feel like new :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading about MSM drops and all their benefits. I rec'd them promptly and began using them, once in the morning and again before bed. These drops seem to make my eyes feel cushioned all day! I hope to see few floaters as I continue to use them. As mentioned by other users, they do burn for a very few seconds but that is all and your eyes should feel very comfortable afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Marbara Stivers

customer_reviews.title: I also suffer from dry eyes and have felt much more comfortable since using these drops
customer_reviews.text: I started using these eye drops morning and night after suffering from an inflamed pinguecula. After using the eye drops regularly and always wearing sunglasses outside my ping has disappeared! I also suffer from dry eyes and have felt much more comfortable since using these drops.
customer_reviews.author: Fulgencio Barista

customer_reviews.title: I will continue using this
customer_reviews.text: I have brown spots on my eyes that my eye doctor calls "Freckles" and my eyes always look somewhat tired and unfortunately brown. I brought this not really expecting a miracle. It didn't necessarily lightening my sclera BUT it did make my eyes feel better plus it helped with the tiredness my eyes felt since I am ALWAYS on my computer so it helps with the tired feeling. There is a slight sting but closing your eyes for a few seconds definitely helps with that feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lane

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a year. Almost done with it and it expired last month hahaaa. I have really dry eyes, they get really itchy and mucus-y, I get allergies from my dog, and seasonal in general. I feel like they do provide some relief but not enough. And my eyes are still red, probably worse. I dont think its the drops, i dont use them everyday but idk. I'm on the market for drops that will brighten my eyes more, heal the broken vessels, and will help keep them not itchy. I love the size of the bottle! Its a great value, maybe this is better for people that dont have allergies???
customer_reviews.author: Jasmill

customer_reviews.title: Hanging In with these!!
customer_reviews.text: On the bright side. I have been using these for at least a week. I have noticed improvements. On the other hand with that they burn going in. And I am experiencing the worst frontal headaches ever. Looking through reviews no one has experienced these. Based on ingredients.. Not familiar with anything that would be causing an allergic reaction. Going to decrease to one drop and see what happen.
customer_reviews.author: Chichuchua Owner

customer_reviews.title: Bought some to sell in my store after using on myself and my dog. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered more after using on my old border collie for cataracts. I can see her brown eyes again after just a few weeks! Her head is not held low to "sniff" her way. No, she still has some cloudiness, but not the blue look from before. I am using the drops also. They are very good feeling drops.

I do like how my eyes feel after I use it. At the end of the day with my shower and in the morning after I've put my make-up on. Cleanses my eyes of eye shadow "fall out" and starts my day. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Sm. change, but I don't think it's iriversable.

I use 2x a day. Its organic , natural and safe to use i put it on my seven year old for his allergies in eyes. great product.

This is the one thing that solves that for me- and I mean within one day. At the slightest hint of a stye coming on, I use a couple of drops and it goes away immediately. Hope this helps other sufferers of styes.

No sunlight and staring at computer screens all night. I've been using these drops for about 2 weeks and it's really cleared up my vision. I noticed a difference the first or second day of using them. A great supplement I highly recommend especially if you stay up all night.

customer_reviews.text: These drops are wonderful. I have severe dry eye and have tried everything including the poplar prescription to no avail. The very first day I used this my tearing was greatly reduced; the 2nd day I did not experience tearing at all. What a blessing as I have been tearing for over 7 years. These drops do sting a little when applying only for a few seconds. I also realized no need to reapply during the day. My other drops were used 2,3, or even 4 times a day and still tearing occurred. I am so thankful to have come across these. My hunt for good and effective eye drops is finally over.

customer_reviews.title: Not so ordinary purpose...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to treat the pannus that affects my german shepherds eyes. Nothing else has been effective and I decided to give Eye Bright a try. The reddness in her eyes has diminished and while I cannot tell if the proud flesh growing over the eye is less, it is definately no longer growing. I believe this is a good alternative to the shots my vet tried or the expensive eye salves that was perscribed. I will try and report again after a longer period of use so that others may know if this is worth pursuing.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! The burn for me is minimal
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! The burn for me is minimal. Definitely not as bad as the burning in my eyes that lasts all day when I don't use the drops. They have really helped with the redness in my eyes. As a matter of fact, these drops seem to be the only thing that help. I have two pingueculi on each eye and while the drops have not made them go away - they are less visible. I stopped using it for a week and I felt the difference. I can just use a drop in each eye every morning and I am set for the rest of the day. Not a miracle but the price is worth my comfort.

customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and am sending it back, after using it and going to sleep I woke up to my eyes being worst than it was and hurting. Please be careful of what you put in your eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drops
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these drops . I’m not sure if it’s my imagination , but they clear up my vision so well . I can’t tell if my contacts are in or out . I usually don’t write many reviews , but these are amazing . I also sent some to my Parents . They really work .
customer_reviews.author: Grandma G.

customer_reviews.title: Soothing. Drops don't burn.
customer_reviews.text: Soothing, not burning, for my chronic dry eyes, but no miracle...which we dry eye victims are constantly hoping for (hint, hint, ophthalmologists!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lompocwoman

customer_reviews.title: Eye rite drops
customer_reviews.text: They more than doubled the price for this product it is outrageous I can get this in town for $13 still I don’t know what they are trying to prove other than ripping everyone off so sad
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Reid

customer_reviews.title: DO  NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY AND DO NOT BARGAIN WITH YOUR EYES HEALTH!
customer_reviews.text: I am a chronic dry eye sufferer, and I had high hopes for this product because of some reviews. Do not fall for it! Not only did it not help my condition but it made it worst. There is no traceability on this product, not even an expiration date. I rarely write reviews but I had to warn potential buyers with eyes conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sty treatment. Hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Day 3: I didnt expect sty to disappear so quickly . My eyes feels less tired and definitely helps the dryness. Hopefully they will brighten as well. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kenya ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: It burns when it hits your eyes unfortunately. Just got it today, so I’ll give it a few days, but I sure don’t look forward to it hitting my eyeballs! However, I think if you’re using it for redness reduction, maybe that’s what it’s supposed to feel like. If it’s for moisturizing — yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I use these drops every morning and evening
customer_reviews.text: Love these drops. Have been great after surgery in both eyes. Purchased 2 more bottles so I would not run out.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Peck

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My vision really did improve. I will always have this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Diane Wattley

customer_reviews.title: product works
customer_reviews.text: worked okay in the beginning but after awhile not much difference to visine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes always redness
customer_reviews.text: My eyes always looked bloodshot but within 2 days of using these eye drops the whites of my eye were clear and bright!! They feel soothing and relieve itchiness. You will like this product I will continue to use
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Vollat

customer_reviews.title: great eye drops
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my eyes and they feel so good.
customer_reviews.author: jane struzinski

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product have not been using long enough to notice any difference but the burning sensation it briefly gives every drop
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Just started using been a few days did NOT notice any difference as stated in comments. Don't know if it was worth the money 🥺
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: Helps with dryness. Eyes felt clean & refresh. Did not sting. Also put drops in our dog’s eye twice a day as well. Stored in refrigerator. Will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: These drops didn't not sooth my eyes, or help ...
customer_reviews.text: These drops did not soothe my eyes or help with my vision. Instead, they gave me dry eyes. I'd never had dry eyes before using this product. After I stopped using the drops it took about a week for the dryness to abate. I wish I could have returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Second Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Have experienced clearer eyesight with this product and have elected to continue use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for my eyes. Waste of my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Adrean P.

customer_reviews.title: Great natural alternative
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a good alternative to harsher eye drops. They aren’t as whitening as brands like Rohto, but much more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bri

customer_reviews.title: Works but formula isnt as strong
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this doesnt work as well as bottles I've bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: C

product_meta.title: Eyebright Drops Cleansing, Soothing, Moisturizing and Refreshing Natural Formula! 1 fl oz.
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionWisdom of the Ages Eyebright Drops are formulated with quality Organic Eyebright Herb extracted with purified water and combined with the natural benefits of purified Sea Salt and MSM. Apple Cider Vinegar and Grapefruit Seed Extract are added in small but effective amounts to preserve and enhance the overall formula. Eyebright naturally contains astringent compounds which help reduce redness, brighten and enhance the beauty of the eyes. The natural compounds in Eyebright cleanse, lubricate, brighten and refresh the eyes. Sea salt, when combined with purified water, is a gentle rehydration for the eyes and replaces natural salt in the tears. MSM is widely known for its positive affect on eye and mucous membrane irritations which can cause the eyes to appear red. Apple cider vinegar has been used successfully as a natural eye wash and preservative. Grapefruit seed extract has many natural benefits and is used as a natural preservative in this formula. Eyebright Drops is an extensive eye formula containing all the natural benefits of Eyebright and MSM in a soothing and lubricating base of pure sea salt and natural glycerin. Wisdom of the Ages Exclusive Warranty: Wisdom of the Ages offers a 30 day exclusive 100% satisfaction warranty on Wisdom of the Ages brand products. This warranty is exclusive to sales through Wisdom of the Ages’ authorized online marketplace resellers only. Purchases made through unauthorized resellers are not covered under this warranty.
feature_bullets: Experience the Cleansing Power of Wisdom of the Ages Eyebright Drops All Natural Eye Formula for soothing, moisturizing and rejuvenating the eyes!

Our Exclusive Formula begins with Quality Organic Eyebright Extract and MSM in a gentle saline solution of purified Sea Salt as an effective rehydration replacing the natural salt in the tears. Eyebright naturally contains astringent compounds which help reduce redness, brighten and enhance the beauty of the eyes. MSM provides a source of natural sulfur which positively affects irritated eyes and mucous membranes.

Pure Apple Cider Vinegar and Natural Grapefruit Seed Extract are added in small but effective amounts to preserve and enhance the overall formula. Apple Cider Vinegar is well known for its benefits as a natural cleansing eye wash and Grapefruit Seed Extract is a safe and natural preservative in this formula.
These Quality Natural Ingredients come together in one Amazing Eye Formula for maintaining brighter, radiant, healthy-looking eyes!
Eyebright Drops relieves dry, red, or weeping eyes, eye irritations and eye strain; supports strong, healthy vision.
